attributes.action: Help all consumers who have credit card debts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a huge decrease in interests rates we feel that the interest rates charged by such banks as Virgin on their credit cards as excessive profiteering with an interest rate of in excess of 30%. We are seeking the government to direct the banks to reduce their credit card rates and help those with a burden of high interest debt like they did for homeowners

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
